attractions.location_local: 朝天门来福士广场洲际酒店
attractions.notes_local: 寄存行李后上午参观。可欣赏长江和嘉陵江交汇处的全景。参观后在来福士吃早餐。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 重庆来福士广场

attractions.notes_base: Morning visit after luggage check-in. Panoramic views of Yangtze and Jialing rivers confluence. Breakfast at Raffles City after visit.

attractions.location_local: 长江滨江路巴蜀园1号
attractions.notes_local: 传统清代会馆，建筑华丽。从来福士过来交通便利。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 湖广会馆

attractions.notes_base: Traditional Qing dynasty guild hall with ornate architecture. Easy access from Raffles City.

attractions.location_local: 嘉陵江滨江路88号
attractions.notes_local: 上午游览湖广会馆之后。白天可看清建筑细节。免费入场。人多需注意。之后去聂财福吃午饭。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 洪崖洞民俗风貌区

attractions.notes_base: Morning visit after Huguang Guild Hall. Daylight allows clear view of architectural details. Free entry. Can be crowded. Then lunch at Nie Caifu.

attractions.location_base: Liziba Zheng Street 62, Liziba Metro Station Exit 1
attractions.location_local: 李子坝正街62号,李子坝地铁站1号出口
attractions.notes_local: 时间允许的话可去。著名的轻轨穿楼站。有观景平台。免费景点。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 李子坝单轨穿楼观景平台

attractions.notes_base: Optional if time permits. Famous monorail station where train passes through building. Viewing platform available. Free attraction.

attractions.name_local: 下浩里 & 龙门浩老街
attractions.location_base: Nanbin Road 105, near Shangxinjie Metro Station
attractions.location_local: 南滨路105号,上新街地铁站附近
attractions.notes_local: 下午参观。历史江边街区，有咖啡馆、书店和特色小店。免费入场，适合拍照和悠闲漫步。评分4.8。相邻区域步行可达。建议游览1.5-2小时。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 龙门浩老街

attractions.notes_base: Afternoon visit. Historic riverside neighborhood with cafes, bookstores, and unique boutiques. Free entry, great for photography and leisurely strolling. Rating 4.8/5. Adjacent areas within walking distance. Recommended duration: 1.5-2 hours.

attractions.location_base: Laojun Po 29, Nanshan Street, Nan'an District
attractions.location_local: 南岸区南山街道老君坡29号
attractions.notes_local: 下午游览。历史悠久的道教道观，位于南山半山腰。可俯瞰重庆江景。评分4.7。周一至周日08:00-17:00营业。门票约10元。建议游览1小时。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 老君洞道观

attractions.notes_base: Afternoon visit. Historic Taoist temple on Nanshan hillside with panoramic views of Chongqing rivers. Rating 4.7/5. Open daily 08:00-17:00. Ticket ~10 CNY. Recommended duration: 1 hour.

attractions.location_base: Changjiahui Shopping Park Rooftop, Nanbin Road
attractions.location_local: 南滨路长嘉汇购物公园天台
attractions.notes_local: 晚间观赏。长嘉汇购物公园4楼或6楼天台观看无人机灯光秀，长江上空表演。20:30开始，约30分钟。建议提前到达占位。门票约120元。视天气情况。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 长嘉汇购物公园

attractions.notes_base: Evening show. Spectacular drone light show over Yangtze River from Changjiahui Shopping Park rooftop (4th or 6th floor). Starts 20:30, ~30 min duration. Arrive early for good viewing position. Ticket ~120 CNY. Weather dependent.

attractions.location_base: Nankang Road South Section, Bazhou District
attractions.location_local: 巴州区南龛路南段
attractions.notes_local: 下午家庭活动选项一。本地景区，有佛教石窟和山坡公园。免费入场。适合和家人散步。游客不多。根据家人喜好在此和望王山之间选择。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 南龛坡

attractions.notes_base: Option 1 for afternoon family activity. Local scenic area with Buddhist grottos and hillside park. Free entry. Good for leisurely walk with family. Not heavily touristed. Choose between this and Wangwang Mountain based on family preference.

attractions.location_local: 巴州区望王西路
attractions.notes_local: 下午家庭活动选项二。山顶公园，有望王山仙踪观景台，靠近家（半山逸城A区）。免费入场。巴中城市景色好。登山步道简单。离家近更方便。可与南龛坡二选一。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 望王山运动公园

attractions.notes_base: Option 2 for afternoon family activity. Mountain park with observation platform (望王山仙踪观景台) near family home at 半山逸城A区. Free entry. Good views of Bazhong city. Easy hiking trails. More convenient location close to residence. Choose between this and Nankang Slope.

attractions.location_local: 武侯区武侯祠大街231号附1号
attractions.notes_local: 下午到达成都后参观。传统清代风格古街，小吃和手工艺品。免费入场，步行可到钦膳斋晚餐。亮灯时间20:00，商户营业9:00-22:00。评分4.8。适合拍照和休闲漫步。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 锦里古街

attractions.notes_base: Afternoon visit after arriving in Chengdu. Traditional Qing dynasty-style street with snacks and crafts. Free entry, walking distance to Qinshanzhai dinner. Lights at 20:00, shops open 9:00-22:00. Rating 4.8/5. Great for photos and leisurely stroll.

attractions.name_base: Chengdu Giant Panda Breeding Research Base
attractions.name_local: 成都大熊猫繁育研究基地
attractions.location_base: Xiongmao Avenue 1375, North Third Ring Road
attractions.location_local: 北三环熊猫大道1375号
attractions.notes_local: 计划9:00到、10:00离开。清晨是看大熊猫活跃的最佳时间。提前网上购票。乘坐地铁3号线到熊猫大道站。因下午航班只能参观1小时。

search_results.display_text: Google Maps - Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding

attractions.notes_base: Arrive 9:00am, leave by 10:00am as planned. Early morning is best time to see pandas active. Book tickets online in advance. Take Metro Line 3 to Xiongmao Avenue Station. Limited 1-hour visit due to afternoon flight.

attractions.location_local: 武侯区武侯祠大街231号
attractions.notes_local: 飞机前快速游览。传统清代风格街道，有小吃和手工艺品。免费入场。靠近市中心，去机场前方便到达。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 锦里古街

attractions.notes_base: Quick visit before flight. Traditional Qing dynasty style street with snacks and crafts. Free entry. Close to city center, easy access before heading to airport.

attractions.location_base: The Bund, Zhongshan East 1st Road, Huangpu District, Shanghai
attractions.location_local: 上海市黄浦区中山东一路（外滩）
attractions.notes_local: 浦东天际线夜景，殖民时期建筑灯光璀璨。老乾杯（外滩5号）晚餐后直接来。全天开放。

search_results.display_text: Google Maps - The Bund

attractions.notes_base: Night view of Pudong skyline, colonial architecture illuminated. Right after dinner at Lao Gan Bei (Bund No.5). Open 24 hours.

attractions.location_base: Wukang Road, Xuhui District (intersection with Hunan Road)
attractions.location_local: 徐汇区武康路(湖南路路口)
attractions.notes_local: 法租界著名的林荫历史街道。欧式建筑，适合拍照。安静的步行区，有精品店、咖啡馆和画廊。免费游览。与安福路相连。北端的武康大楼是标志性打卡点。建议游览1小时。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 武康路历史文化名街

attractions.notes_base: Famous tree-lined historic street in French Concession. Perfect for photography with European-style architecture. INFJ-friendly: peaceful walking area with boutique shops, cafes, and art galleries. Free to explore. Connects to Anfu Road area. Iconic Wukang Building at north end is Instagram-worthy landmark. Recommended duration: 1h.

attractions.location_local: 浦东新区滨江大道2777号
attractions.notes_local: 时间允许可去。当代美术馆，轮换展览。靠近陆家嘴的江边位置。安静。提前网上购票。根据逛完法租界后的体力决定。
attractions.notes_base: Optional if time permits. Contemporary art museum with rotating exhibitions. Waterfront location near Lujiazui. Quiet, INFJ-friendly atmosphere. Book tickets online in advance. Consider based on energy levels after walking French Concession.

attractions.location_base: Former French Concession, Xuhui District, Shanghai
attractions.location_local: 上海市徐汇区法租界
attractions.notes_local: 全天开放。亮点：林荫小巷、装饰艺术建筑、隐藏精品店。推荐路线：永福路、复兴西路、湖南路。建议游览1.5小时。
attractions.notes_base: [opening_hours: 24h; highlights: Tree-lined lanes, art deco architecture, hidden boutiques; tips: Wander along Yongfu Road, Fuxing West Road, Hunan Road] Recommended duration: 1.5h.

attractions.location_local: 浦东新区川沙镇申迪西路753号
attractions.notes_local: 全天游玩。提前在官方APP或官网购票。早到抢先入园。可通过APP使用快速通行证。乘坐地铁11号线到迪士尼站。票价为平日标准价（随季节变动）。乐园通常9:00-21:00营业。热门项目：创极速光轮、加勒比海盗、奇幻童话城堡。
attractions.notes_base: Full day visit. Book tickets online in advance (official app or website). Arrive early for rope drop. FastPass+ system available via app. Take Metro Line 11 to Disney Resort Station. Ticket price is standard weekday rate (varies by season). Park hours typically 9am-9pm. Popular attractions: TRON, Pirates of Caribbean, Enchanted Storybook Castle.

attractions.location_base: Start from Tiantong Road Metro Station Exit 3, walk to Shanghai Post Museum area
attractions.location_local: 天潼路地铁站3号口出发，步行至上海邮政博物馆区域
attractions.notes_local: 天潼路地铁站（12号线3号出口）出发。向南走到河边，然后沿河向东漫步。看老住宅、上海邮政博物馆（周三至周日09:00-17:00，周一二闭馆）。博物馆前的过街天桥是观赏浦东天际线的最佳位置。过桥看城市天际线。免费滨江步道。2月气温5-10°C，注意保暖。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 上海邮政博物馆

attractions.notes_base: Start from Tiantong Road metro (Line 12, Exit 3). Walk south to river, then east along riverside. See old residential buildings, Shanghai Post Museum (open Wed-Sun 09:00-17:00, closed Mon-Tue). Best Pudong skyline view from crossing in front of post museum. Cross bridges with city skyline views. Free riverside walk. February temp 5-10°C, dress warmly.

attractions.location_base: The Bund, Zhongshan East 1st Road, Huangpu District
attractions.location_local: 黄浦区中山东一路（外滩）
attractions.notes_local: 沿外滩向南漫步。欣赏西侧万国建筑博览群和历史建筑。著名的滨江长廊，殖民时期建筑。全天开放。评分4.9。上午人少更佳。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 外滩

attractions.notes_base: Walk along the Bund heading south. See Wanguo Construction Expo Group and historic buildings on west side. Famous waterfront promenade with colonial architecture. 24-hour access. Rating 4.9/5. Best visited in morning for fewer crowds.

attractions.location_base: Nanjing East Road 558, from the Bund end
attractions.location_local: 南京东路558号，从外滩端向西
attractions.notes_local: 从外滩端沿南京路向西漫步。中国最著名的商业街。在苹果南京东路店附近结束。全天开放（店铺10:00-22:00）。评分4.9。Chiikawa旗舰店在南京东路123号（外滩中央商场F1，10:00-22:00营业）——可在此步行期间顺便参观。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 南京路步行街
高德地图 - Chiikawa旗舰店

attractions.notes_base: Walk west along Nanjing Road from the Bund end. Most famous commercial street in China. End near Apple Nanjing East. 24-hour access (shops 10:00-22:00). Rating 4.9/5. Chiikawa flagship store at Nanjing East Road 123 (Bund Central Mall F1, open 10:00-22:00) - can visit during this walk if desired.

attractions.location_base: Start from Fuxing East Road Ferry Station to Dongchang Ferry Station
attractions.location_local: 复兴东路渡口到东昌路渡口
attractions.notes_local: 从复兴东路渡口（06:00-21:00营业，2元）坐轮渡到东昌路渡口（东复线07:00-21:00营业）。上层甲板是观赏黄浦江的最佳位置。浦东上岸后用支付宝租共享单车（1-2元），沿专用滨江自行车道向北骑行。经过陆家嘴、国金中心、著名环形天桥。骑到苹果浦东店附近。日落前30分钟返回江边拍摄黄金时段。晚上从泰同栈坐轮渡回来看夜景。警告：2月气温5-10°C，江边会很冷。务必穿厚衣服和防风外套。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 上海轮渡复兴东路渡口
高德地图 - 东昌路渡口

attractions.notes_base: Take ferry from Fuxing East Road Ferry (open 06:00-21:00, ¥2) to Dongchang Ferry (open 07:00-21:00 for Dongfu Line). Upper deck has best Huangpu River view. Rent shared bike via Alipay on Pudong side (¥1-2), ride north along dedicated riverside bike path. Pass through Lujiazui, see IFC Mall, famous circular footbridge. Continue to Apple Pudong area. Return to riverside 30 min before sunset for golden hour views. Take evening ferry back from Taitongzhan for night view. WARNING: February temp 5-10°C, riverside will be COLD. Dress very warmly with windbreaker.

attractions.location_local: 北京市海淀区
attractions.notes_local: 帮女朋友熟悉环境。校园导览。传统中式与现代建筑交融。入校需证件（护照）。可能需提前网上预约。校园很大，重点看学生服务区附近。
attractions.notes_base: Help girlfriend establish comfort zone. Campus tour to familiarize with area. Beautiful traditional Chinese architecture mixed with modern buildings. ID required for entry (passport). May need advance registration online. Large campus, focus on main areas near student services.

attractions.location_local: 北京市海淀区,邻近清华大学
attractions.notes_local: 备选或补充的校园参观。未名湖是标志性景点。入校要求同清华。两校相邻。帮女朋友探索周边的餐厅和生活设施。
attractions.notes_base: Alternative or additional campus visit. Historic Weiming Lake (未名湖) is iconic. Similar entry requirements as Tsinghua. Both universities close to each other. Explore nearby restaurants and facilities for girlfriend's daily life support.

attractions.location_local: 五道口及大学周边
attractions.notes_local: 校园参观后探索五道口学生区——有餐厅、咖啡馆、超市和国际美食。帮女朋友找到日常所需：便利店、药店、银行、地铁站。
attractions.notes_base: After campus tours, explore Wudaokou area (五道口) - student district with restaurants, cafes, supermarkets, and international food. Help girlfriend identify daily necessities locations: grocery stores, pharmacies, banks, metro stations.

attractions.location_local: 海淀区租房周边
attractions.notes_local: 继续帮女朋友熟悉环境。舞蹈工作室注册后探索更多周边设施。下课后可安排晚间活动。
attractions.notes_base: Continue establishing girlfriend's comfort zone. After dance studio registration, explore more local amenities. Evening activities possible after class.

attractions.location_local: 东城区景山前街4号
attractions.notes_local: 全天可用。需提前在官网购票（必须）。从午门进、神武门出。建议租语音导览。至少预留3-4小时。周二闭馆。热门宫殿：太和殿、御花园、储秀宫、钟表馆。
attractions.notes_base: Full day available. Book tickets online in advance (mandatory, through official website). Enter from Meridian Gate (午门), exit from Gate of Divine Prowess (神武门). Audio guide recommended. Allow 3-4 hours minimum. Avoid Tuesdays (closed). Popular palaces: Hall of Supreme Harmony, Imperial Garden, Palace of Gathered Elegance, Clock Museum.

attractions.location_base: Nanluoguxiang: Dongcheng District (Metro Line 6/8). 798: Jiuxianqiao Road 4, Chaoyang District
attractions.location_local: 南锣鼓巷:东城区(地铁6/8号线). 798:朝阳区酒仙桥路4号
attractions.notes_local: 根据兴趣选择：(1) 南锣鼓巷——历史胡同，有咖啡馆、精品店、传统建筑。游客多但有韵味。靠近故宫。(2) 798艺术区——旧工厂改造的当代艺术画廊。人少，更安静。都免费。798需从市中心打车。
attractions.notes_base: Choose based on interest: (1) Nanluoguxiang - historic hutong alley with cafes, boutiques, traditional architecture. Touristy but charming. Closer to Forbidden City. (2) 798 Art District - contemporary art galleries in former factory complex. Less crowded, more INFJ-friendly. Modern art scene. Both free entry. 798 requires taxi/Didi from city center.

attractions.location_local: 三里屯,鼓楼,五道口各街区
attractions.notes_local: 探索北京精品咖啡和设计师潮玩店。三里屯有很多生活方式精品店。
attractions.notes_base: Explore Beijing's specialty coffee scene and designer toy shops. Sanlitun area has many lifestyle boutiques. See meals and shopping agents for specific recommendations.

attractions.location_base: Sanlitun Taikoo Li, Xidan, or Wangfujing
attractions.location_local: 三里屯太古里,西单,王府井
attractions.notes_local: 如果需要购物。主要购物区：三里屯太古里（高端，类似成都太古里）、西单（中端国产品牌）、王府井（百货商场）。
attractions.notes_base: If desired. Major shopping districts: Sanlitun Taikoo Li (high-end, similar to Chengdu Taikoo Li), Xidan (mid-range Chinese brands), Wangfujing (department stores). See shopping agent for details.

attractions.name_local: 自由活动日 - 灵活安排
attractions.location_local: 多种选择
attractions.notes_local: 可选：(1) 天坛——历史古建筑群。(2) 颐和园——皇家园林，有昆明湖。(3) 景山公园——故宫后面的山顶公园，可看城市全景。(4) 胡同探索。(5) 博物馆：国家博物馆、首都博物馆。根据天气和心情决定。
attractions.notes_base: Options: (1) Temple of Heaven Park (天坛) - historic temple complex with beautiful architecture. (2) Summer Palace (颐和园) - imperial garden with Kunming Lake. (3) Jingshan Park (景山公园) - hill park behind Forbidden City with panoramic city views. (4) More hutong exploration. (5) Museums: National Museum, Capital Museum. Plan based on weather and mood.

attractions.location_base: Tianjin city, 30-min high-speed train from Beijing
attractions.location_local: 天津市,距北京高铁30分钟
attractions.notes_local: 可选天津一日游。北京南站高铁30分钟到天津。景点：(1) 意大利风情街——欧式建筑。(2) 古文化街——传统店铺和寺庙。(3) 海河滨水区。(4) 五大道——殖民时期洋楼，适合拍照。(5) 瓷房子——独特博物馆。高铁单程约54元。
attractions.notes_base: If desired, day trip to Tianjin. High-speed train 30 minutes from Beijing South Station to Tianjin. Attractions: (1) Italian Style Street (意大利风情街) - European architecture. (2) Ancient Culture Street (古文化街) - traditional shops and temples. (3) Haihe River waterfront. (4) Five Great Avenues (五大道) - colonial-era mansions, good for photography. (5) Porcelain House (瓷房子) - unique museum. Train cost ~54 RMB one-way.

attractions.location_local: 北京
attractions.notes_local: 不去天津的话继续探索北京。选项同第15天。或者在咖啡馆和周边放松一天。
attractions.notes_base: If not going to Tianjin, more Beijing exploration. Options same as Day 15. Or relaxed day at cafes and local neighborhoods.

attractions.name_base: Final Day Activities - Shopping & Memorable Experiences
attractions.name_local: 最后一天活动 - 购物与纪念体验
attractions.location_local: 多个地点
attractions.notes_local: 在一起的最后一整天。选项：(1) 重访旅途中喜欢的地方。(2) 最后买礼物/纪念品。(3) 雍和宫——藏传佛教寺庙。(4) 国家大剧院（如有演出）。(5) 特别餐厅浪漫晚餐。(6) 景点拍照留念。留下美好回忆。
attractions.notes_base: Last full day together. Options: (1) Revisit favorite spots from trip. (2) Final shopping for gifts/souvenirs. (3) Lama Temple (雍和宫) - beautiful Tibetan Buddhist temple. (4) National Centre for Performing Arts if special show available. (5) Romantic dinner at special restaurant (see meals agent). (6) Photography at scenic spots. Make it memorable.
